name: Space Game (SlickSodaProductions, z00l, Alex)
description:
Storyline/Setting
When the Superpowers of Earth learned about a new planet on the edge of the Milky Way Galaxy, everyone quickly raced to hire Astronauts willing to explore the new Planet and claim it for their contractors. After arriving on the planet's surface, the Astronauts quickly learn that the planet is inhabited, and must fight against the locals (and each other) in order to survive...

Mechanics
Take command of your own Astronaut and fight to eliminate the most enemies, or take own your fellow survivors in this PvPvE Shooter game. Fight across an Alien world as you collect powerups and gold in order to buy upgrades or new equipment to increase your chances for survival. Push through PvE events where you keep facing waves of enemies until the last player goes down, or fight to see who’s the best in PvP tournaments. Either step up in the ring or place your bets on who you think will be the winner!

Controls
WASD - Move
Q - Shop
Space - Jump
M1 - Shoot
M2 - Slash (Melee)
Shift - Dash
R - Grenade

Alexander Hecht

Joshua Kim

Julian Maniquis
